document.full_text: a malaysian man faces charges of attempting to smuggle nine chinese aliens into the united states on board the luxury rms queen mary 2 ocean liner, officials said on monday.
document.title: queen mary 2 luxury liner used in alleged smuggling case
lines_and_colors: a malaysian man faces charges of attempting to smuggle nine chinese aliens into the united states on board the luxury rms queen mary 2 ocean liner, officials said on monday.
